DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : SERVICE : NOMINATIONS FOR ' UNSUNG HERO ' AWARDS
DOC.TEXT: The Japanese American Historical Society of Southern California is accepting nominations for its fourth annual community service and achievement awards , which recognize the " unsung heroes " in the community . Nominees should be organizations or individuals who have served the Japanese American community or promoted Japanese American heritage through cultural and artistic achievements . Nominees can be from anywhere in Southern California and are not limited to Japanese Americans . Nominations must be submitted by May 27 , and forms may be requested by calling Iku Kiriyama at ( 310 ) 326-0608 . Five winners will receive $ 500 each . IRIS YOKOI
